main event: A UFO was observed in Waterloo, Iowa on 3/25/57 by ground radar for 5 minutes, described as the size of a pea in the sky, stationary with a downward dipping motion, emitting a flame-like light in the rear, and no sound.
interesting points: The UFO was observed by ground radar and described as having erratic motion.
There were no photographs of the UFO in the report.
The UFO was reported to be just above the horizon in the northwest direction.
The report was documented and sent to various Air Force Commanders and Intelligence Centers.
